title: Stone Mason Themed Room with Breakfast
about: The Museum is a first of it's kind in Nepal (and dare we say, even the world). Not only are all our six distinct rooms/apartments culturally immersive but interactive as well. In collaboration with our partner company, Backstreet Academy, we've picked up six different crafts that culturally embedded in Nepali society and designed our apartments around them. Namely, woodwork, stone carving, Madal instrument, Thangka paintings, pottery and Khukuri (steel blades of the famed Gurkha warriors).The spaceA master craftsperson has taken responsibility of each apartment/room to display his uniquely hand-crafted work, and what makes our apartments special is you can meet and attend the workshops (all under 5 hours) of any of these craftsperson to truly culturally immerse yourself with the theme of your room. Or if you'd like you can also directly purchase the products of these craftsmen and avoid the overpriced souvenirs sold in the markets. This apartment in particular has undertones of a stone mason's home and has the works displayed of Hom Basnet, a stone mason the likes of whom have builtthe ancient cities of Kathmandu.The building itself was builtover 30 years ago as a residential property, but we've renovated it to serve as a one-of-a-kind Bed & Breakfast. We also have a farmers market that's held in our gardens every Saturday from 7am to 1pm.

reviews.reivew: Everything was perfect!Imran helped us for everything (keep luggages during our trip to Tibet and Chitwan, call the driver for the several transfer, laundry services provided, discount for restaurant close to the accomodation just 4 steps). Last but not least he was friendly and very nice. I said thanks also to the guardian which helped us last day. I really recommend this accommodation for someone who want to have an adventure holiday in Nepal.

title: Salon de Kathmandu B&B - Room 1 (with breakfast)
about: Stay at safe and clean place during your stay in Kathmandu! Lazimpat is popular residential area for both foreign and wealthy local people because of its very clean, convenient and safe environment. The city center, Durbar Marg and Thamel, is all located in walking distance. Convenient location, safe area, super clean house with beautiful garden and good foods, any reason to hesitate? ;)

reviews.reivew: Beautiful location with a nice café and restaurant. My room was really comfortable and check in was also very easy. I definitely can recommend.
Quiet place to stay if you want to be away from the noise and dust of Kathmandu's busy roads.Neat outdoor seating Good food and drinks.

Maison de Kathmandu was the perfect base for my time in Kathmandu. The accommodation is within easy walking distance to tourist sites and great restaurants while also offering a calm, quiet and safe environment. The on-site restaurant is lovely with a beautiful garden area, great coffee and staff that are super friendly and welcoming. The room is clean with natural light and the other amenitiesavailable, such as kettle and washing machine are great. This is a wonderful property, excellent value and highly recommended!
An absolutely gorgeous airbnb in the heart of Kathmandu. Great value for money with an awesome group of staff/host to take care of your stay. Highly recommend, a definite 5/5 for me.
Beautiful place, loved the garden cafe. everything was perfect.

clean and neat place. smooth check-in and very helpful staff. spacious room. but no AC. a bit difficultto locate the place but overall its near the main street. easy to get taxi and public transport. The food is GOOD (8/10). Highly recommend to others

title: Salon de Kathmandu B&B - Room 3 (with breakfast)
about: Stay at a safe, clean and comfortable place during your stay in Kathmandu! We are located in Lazimpat, a popular residential area for expats, diplomats, tourists and locals alike because of its very clean, convenient and safe environment. The city center, Durbar Marg and Thamel, are all located within walking distance. Convenient location, safe area, super clean house with beautiful garden and good foods, any reason to hesitate? ;)

reviews.reivew: Maison/ Salon de Kathmandu offered everything we were looking for - a great location, beautiful garden, good food and drinks, friendly staff and spacious rooms for ample relaxation. We are looking forward to our next visit and can definitely recommend staying here for anyone coming to Kathmandu.
Great location, lovely staff, and good food. Thanks for another pleasant stay at the Salon
Fantastic room and really helpful staff! The whole property feltchic and relaxed

I've stayed in all three rooms here and have only great things to say. The rooms are comfortable. The staff is friendly and helpful. And the rooms are in a house that also hosts a lovely cafe in a beautiful garden so there's a calm space to relax and tasty food on offer without even leaving the premises. Communication is easy and everyone went above and beyond to make me feel cared for. I hate to recommend this place too strongly because I want there to be space when I return. But the truth is, it's lovely, And when I return, I'll hope to stay here again!

This listing is a gem right in the heart of the city of Kathmandu, but tucked away enough that it is its own little piece of peaceful escape. The cafe/restaurant attached is absolutely amazing if you are craving some food from home from the western part for the world. The space is clean, bedding soft and comfortable, and the water pressure for the shower is amazing (for those who loves a good shower.) It is close to many foreign embassies, and various landmarks like Garden of Dreams. What an amazing and quiet place to stay to finish up my two week trip in Nepal!

To be completely honest, Kathmandu was disappointing for us because of several reasons. We expected much more from the city. But the only reason why we stayed longer is because Jennifer and her team made our stay very pleasant, they were very helpful without mentioning the fact that they have a restaurant downstairs and the food is delicious.Maybe I wouldn't recommend Kathmandu in a personal perspective, but I would definitely recommend this Airbnb if anyone was going there!

title: Round House with Balcony & Garden View 301
about: Do you want to escape from hectic lifestyle, fast technology, city-life and work enjoying birds singing, swimming butterflies in our natural gardens with peaceful lake view of swinging in the hammock. It’s a tranquil and relaxing on the outskirts of Pokhara; enveloped in the natural Himalayan splendour and situated about150m overlooking the Phewa lake.Come to enjoy our Hidden Paradise in the real Nepalese village to experience the real paradise. It's only 30 mins walk from busy LakesideThe spaceIt is surrounded by nature overlooking Phewa Lake which is the second largest lake in Nepal, the main town of Pokhara, the World Heritage Stupa, temple in the lake more. It is a tranquil and relaxing getaway and the most popular room in our property. It offers excellent views of the mountains, their reflections in the lake, World Heritage Stupa, Temple in the lake etc. Clean mountain air and a peaceful environment compliment the friendly, family run atmosphere of this hillside guest house, which makes this truly Hidden Paradise unique and unlike any place you have ever been to before. Our favorite part of the place, where our guests spend most time is in our gardens viewing the lake.  Our guests describe it if amazing breath-taking view. You also enjoy the deep fresh air breath in.In our place there are some geckos, crickets, fireflies, butterflies, birds and sometime monkeys too! Remember we are living in nature :)This is also great for meditation, yoga & healing practices. We often do milking freshly from buffalo from our relatives in the village and we cook organic seasonable vegetables. Our spring water comes from the mountain behind our place carrying the goodness of Himalayan minerals. We use it after having purified for drinking and cooking. If you prefer, we have bottled water also. We follow an environmentally friendly and sustainable way of living and we are actively supporting the local community; our hot showers are heated by solar energy, in our kitchen we only use produce and vegetables from the area, our employees come from the nearby villages and the support of the local youth club has been a priority for several years.Come to enjoy our Hidden Paradise surrounded by nature and real Nepalese village to experience the real paradise. It's only 30 mins walk from busy Lakeside and a perfect retreat for solo traveller, couples, artists or musicians whoever would like to experience beauty of nature.Round House is located our highest position with a private big balcony. It is a traditional and magical room surrounded by nature. The room has one big bed with hot shower & bathtub in the private bathroom.Breakfast and local and international meals are available for lunch and dinner upon request. It is enjoyed in our garden too.

reviews.reivew: This is an exceptional stay in amazing surroundings with lovely people. Cannot rate the experience highly enough.

The round house is exactly as pictured and very comfortable and peaceful. Laxman, Patricia and Jason welcomed me into their home, and made themselves available for any situation. Breakfast was delicious. The rooms are clean and the paragliding was amazing. Thanks for a wonderful visit

This place was truly magical. Everything aboutit was just beautiful! Such a lovely, calm place with a breathtaking view. Super clean! Laxman was so great and helpful with everything, even with things outside the house. The food there is mouth watering, so so good and tasty! And to top it all, my boyfriend proposed there because he wouldn’t have done it any other place. Thank you for everything, definitely my favorite trip 🧡🧡🧡

This is a beautiful place with awesome view of Fewa lake. The hospitality of the host, tidiness of the accommodation and tranquility of the environment more than compensates a few minutes walk up the hill needed to reach the place.

The perfect way to dive into beautiful nepali nature with the splendid view of Fewa lake, mountains and Pokhara. Neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful: it’s a very friendly village but there’re some shops and even street food only 5 min walk. Laxman is very helpful host: he helped us with renting a scooter and gave some advises aboutdifferent attractions around Pokhara. I definitely recommend this place. It was one of the best chill experience.

The roundhouse is a nice retreat from the busy lakeside of Pokhara. It is a good 45 min walk from Lakeside but the views of the lake and mountains and the secluded location more than make up for it and was what we were looking for after a 4 days trek. Walking distance from a nice restaurant by the North side of the lake.

title: Accommodation Jupiter
about: Gusto accommodation Located in Pokhara, within 2.4 km from main part of City. Property provide restaurant, bar, free WiFi.All rooms feature a TV with cable channels and a private bathroom.The property features a restaurant.Mosty Nepalese foods and A continental or à la carte breakfast is available daily.At the property, the rooms come with a desk,have a kettle.While some have a terrace,hot tub,mini bar, air- condition, complimentry tea/coffee/bottle of waterFewa Lake is just 10 miter ahead.

reviews.reivew: The host is wonderful! He helped us a lot and is very nice and kind. The room is very clean and not far from fewa lake. The view of the restaurant totally worth. Not to mention the great taste. We had the best experience in Nepal thanks to the host!

We really enjoyed the stay at Accomodation Jupiter. The place was impeccably clean and the view was amazing. The staff always friendly and pleasant. Breakfast was very well presented and yummy. We even ordered some local food for dinner which was delicious.  We will definitely choose the place next time we visit Pokhara.

A really good stay here. the view is perfect,just fact the beautiful lake.you may see a sunset in a good weather l guess. the restaurant provide a tasty breakfast and good drink.  the host uncle is really nice to offer any help he can in my stay. l will choice this accommodation next time l come here.

We spent 2 nights at this beautiful place in Pokhara. Located at a quick 10 minute drive / 20 minute walk from the main lakeside market, this is a perfect spot if you're looking for a quiet place away from the market. The in-house Gusto restaurant is a very pretty spot at a top of hill mound which gives a 360 view of Pokhara. The staff is very helpful and Rana is an amazing host with great tips for local activities. Definitely one of the better places to stay in Pokhara. Look forward to being back soon.
Best you can get in Pokhara. Breakfast is amazing with varieties
very very good and very beautiful house and kind people

title: Chaamp- Cozy/exotic attic suite w/ free parking
about: Unwind and soak in the mountain air at our picturesque A-frame Attic Villa, where you will be greeted with an incredible view from floor to ceiling windows. Our thoughtfully designed attic villa is the quintessential getaway from the hustle and bustle. It's a mini-retreat for you and your family/ friends or partner to renew your love for life. Sit back relax and rediscover your inner peace at Rays & HazeThe spaceChaamp- A cozy and romantic suite with floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony. The modern and minimalistic decor of these rooms creates a space that defines tranquility and resonates with your inner peace. Chaamp the suite (a part of Rays & Haze) is located amidst the lush green pine trees overlooking the majestic Kanchenjunga.Rays & Haze is a double-storey property and Chaamp is located on the second floor. The first floor is aesthetically designed to create a warm, welcoming space with a fully equipped kitchenette, dining hall, and recreational space. Guests can indulge in reading, relaxing, or enjoying the rejuvenating view. We offer complimentary breakfast and beverages (tea/coffee/milk)If you do not wish to step out, we can provide home-cooked lunch, dinner, snacks, and drinks on order*

reviews.reivew: We stayed in the attic room which was charming, wood fashioned and opened its balcony to beautiful mountains & kanchenjunga view. The room was cozy and clean. The host, kausila aunty is very sweet and supportive throughout; they also provide delicious food on pre-orders and their momos are a must try!!!!
Worthy to visit to have wonderful memories with family and friends…
We had a lovely stay here. Everything was just perfect. Super clean house and rooms are beautifully done. Food was served warm and with love. We plan to be back again. Thank you!!

title: Private room  , Ground Floor room
about: Our accommodations are located in the small village of Vashisht a town located 3km from Manali . Vashisht is known for it's two beautiful temples (Rama & Shiva Temples), natural hot spring baths (located 200 yards from the homestay!),  If you wish to explore outside of Vashisht, you can hire an auto-rickshaw to take you to Manali or any of the surrounding villages like Solang Valley, Old Manali Etc. There are plenty of walking paths.  sthe majestic Jogini Waterfall short hike from home stay .The spaceOur place is situated 100 metres from the Vashisht temple, easily accessible by road (bike, car, auto, foot). We are 3kms away from Manali Mall Road (Manali Market). this is Ground floor room middle of village .Our bedroomsoffer scenic views of the valley, river, and towering mountains. Twin bedcan be combined to form one single bed. The bathroom comes equipped with a shower and warm water. Bottled water is not included in the rooms, but you can ask our staff to purchase water if needed. Laundry services are also available upon request—perfect for weary travelers wanting some clean clothes!

reviews.reivew: Very nice location and very warm people. Food also was good. However, since there are solar panels for hot water, water wont be hot for 24 hours.
Stayed here for a month. Location of the property is good. Has a well equipped kitchen and also Chhape sir was very helpful throughout the stay
Stayed for a week. Location is very decent and view from balcony is very addictive.One of the best location I have ever seen for longer stays.

Chhape Ji was an excellent host and was always present to help out with any need.aboutthe location, it's located at a 2mins walking distance from Vashisht Temple and aboutan hour's hike away from Jogini Falls.aboutthe room, it's exactly as described in the listing, and the view from the balcony was of apricot and apple trees, the river, and snowcapped peaks.Pro tip: Go through all the listings by Chhape and select the room on the highest floor (marginally expensive) for an unobstructed view of the mountain peaks.Con: The heating in the room is inadequate for winter stays, and particularly during the snowfall season, it could get uncomfortable in the room. A personal heater was provided but apparently having the heater on for long was a safety hazard as said by Chhapeji.

The Best place to stay, period! Location wise, view wise, amenities, warmth of host, everything is just the perfect here! We stayed here for a week, then planned to spend few more weeks at different places, but no other place is as good as this listing. Ganesh and Chappe ji have been very resourceful and flexible too. Great place for WFH as well since internet speed as well as power backup is available!

Thanks a lot for this more than a perfect location, I can not explain how much we enjoyed our stay there. Mr. Chappe provides great hospitality and services.We stayed there for a month and enjoyed and found adventures almost each and every day.This location has great view and is very close to Vashisth Temple. I loved Vashisth more than any place in Manali itselfThanks

title: Chimal- chic/cozy room with mountain view
about: Unwind and soak in the mountain air at our picturesque A-frame Attic Villa, where you will be greeted with an incredible view from floor to ceiling windows. Our thoughtfully designed attic villa is the quintessential getaway from the hustle and bustle. It's a mini-retreat for you and your family/ friends or partner to renew your love for life. Sit back relax and rediscover your inner peace at Rays & Haze.The spaceChimal- A cozy and romantic room with modern and minimalistic decor. A perfect getaway from your busy and hectic lifestyle.This property (a part of Rays & Haze) is located amidst the lush green pine trees overlooking the majestic Kanchenjunga.Rays & Haze is a double-storey property and Chimal is located on the first floor. The first floor is aesthetically designed to create a warm, welcoming space with a fully equipped kitchenette, dining hall, and recreational space. Guests can indulge in reading, relaxing, or enjoying the rejuvenating view. We offer complimentary breakfast and beverages (tea/coffee/milk)If you do not wish to step out, we can provide home-cooked lunch, dinner, snacks, and drinks on order*

reviews.reivew: Wonderful hosts, very accommodating. Extremely clean and comfortable rooms. Food is awesome!

Excellent arrangement. Well decorated and well equipped rooms. Beautiful people make our stay very comfortable.Close to Kurseong town and the town is easily accessible. At the same time far from maddening crowd.

title: Luitel Homestay- Artsy Luxury Retreat - Room 5
about: Large airy room with attached bathroom. Rates inclusive of breakfast. Get a slice of an authentic Sikkimese home in the family house of one of the oldest Sikkimese Nepali families, hosted by the youngest son of the family; who has lived all around the world. Enjoy rooms filled with antiques, furniture and art from Sikkim, Europe and India. Fuss free stay with no restrictions on late night sojourns - as long as you respect the fact you are in a family home and not a hotel.The spaceAn independent floor in a family home. There are 5 independent rooms with attached bathrooms. 3 rooms havebalconies. There is also a cosy common living room and a dining area. We also provide delicious home made food using all organic produce sourced from our farm in West Sikkim and our own grounds around the house. The food menu reflects my own history - Food that I grew up with in Sikkim and food that I grew to love during my stays all around the world. We also have a wide selection of drinks on offer.No loud music or noise after 9 pm.The house sits in a large private gated compound with 3 large greenhouses growing vegetables and many varieties of fruits - Plums, Peaches, Lime, Lemons, Oranges, Apples, Crab Apples, Grapes and seasonal local vegetables. We have a large vegetable gardens where we grow all kinds of local vegetables through out the year and there is a chicken coop. Guests are free to walk around the grounds and I can give a tour showing you all the produce we grow.We aim to be a Eco-friendly operation and a lot of thought has gone into every single detail - our teas are sourced from the organic tea estate in Sikkim and our coffee is sourced from an organic plantation in Nagaland. All our toiletries are made especially for us and are 100% natural. Even our cleaning supplies are 100% natural with no harmful chemicals. We have even managed to source bio degradable garbage bags! Please use as little plastic as possible during your trip. We are happy to provide you filtered water for free - please carry a reusable bottle along for your trip and lets try and keep Sikkim plastic free!!Guest accessOther than the spacious rooms, the guests have access to the drawing room, the dining area and the grounds around the house. Once in a while we also let guest have access to our amazing terrace.

reviews.reivew: Great place and very accommodating hosts. Helped us with everything and made our stay really comfortable

It was a lovely staycation. Learnt so much aboutthe culture and food. Amrit was kind to teach us how to make momos from scratch. The entire property is beautiful with a huge kitchen garden, with literally everything in it. From nectarines to avocados to bluberries. Loved the Sikkim thali he offered for dinner the day we landed, we wiped the whole plate within minutes. A must, if you ever visit Gangtok.

Amrit's place was perfect for our vacation, from start to finish! We got the friendliest, warmest welcome after a very long day, and feltat home right from the beginning. They're helpful when we need information aboutplaces, permits and booking, are full of stories aboutthe different parts of Sikkim and the ways of life, and will make sure your evenings are unforgettably fun (if you choose it), even after a day of long hikes! They'll really take care of you. Amrit knows the best places to find the right things in the city – momos, thongba, friendly pubs, art, meat, traditional things, monasteries – and all the inside information. He's also got an enviable collection of books, art and curios all over the house. And some evenings, lovely Nepali music. And there's so many birds to see from the balconies! (Amrit can ID most of these for you, but don't trust him on the names of stars.) We stayed a week here, but wanted some more. The house is a very short taxi ride from MG Marg, and the taxi stop is right around the corner. If you go during the right season, Amrit's garden will be bursting with fruits and vegetables. Ask him aboutthe local ingredients and cuisine!Very happy we chose Amrit's place in Gangtok. Feltlike family :)

Luitel Homestay is a lovely place to be.. Amrit,the host is very friendly and not only helps with the direction to reach his place but provides you with all the options available to roam around in the city. The dinner they prepare with their home grown vegetables and the presentation is an experience in itself.
Overall, I had a great experience with the him. The room was wonderful, clean, and perfect .

Amrit is gem of a person. He is compassionate, humble and he goes an extra mile to elevate your experience. He is great drinking company and you can talk to him practically abouteverything!I wish we could have stayed longer. There's always a next time. Thanks buddy, we will miss you.

title: Secluded stay @Gangtok
about: A perfect getaway for guests travelling to Gangtok and at the same time looking for a peaceful neighborhood , with nature all around.Food will be completely homecooked and organic. Sikkimese cuisine like momo, thukpa also available.*Breakfast is complimentary.The spaceA new builtproperty, well furnished and maintained.  An urban homestay I'd like to say. Good Hi speed internet is available.

reviews.reivew: Nice hospitality 👍
Very cooperative and lovely Host. Good Homemade Food. Simplicity. Peace. The only issue is connectivity from MG Road.
Amazing food - Organically procured from farm. The view from terrace at night & morning will steal your heart.Mukku the love dog will make you enjoy the day.

title: Hug Inn Phrae- Double bed
lt: Tambon Thung Kwao, Chang Wat Phrae, Thailand
about: A homey bed and breakfast in Phrae, Thailand with trendy but well priced in the loft-like style. Cozy stay with a few minutes walk to old town.We have 4 room types ready for your stay ; Family room (for up to 8 guests - 72 sqm), Connecting room (4 guest - 48 sqm), Loft room (3 guests -36 sqm), Standard room (2 guests - 24 spm). All rooms are available with an air-conditioner, a flatscreen TV, a refrigerator, sitting are, private bath room, water heater. Cafe' in the same area open everyday.

reviews.reivew: Newly builtclean building. Host friendly. Delicious breakfast. Comfortable cafe. Everything was good.

title: Baan Sri Dha - Lanna Style Home & Yoga
lt: Hai Ya, Chang Wat Chiang Mai, Thailand
about: Our charming home is semi wooden with 3 A/C bedroomsand 3 bathrooms. It is equipped with a kitchen, a bar, fiber optic wifi and a large open space upstairs. It is perfect for a family with children or a group of friends. We are 10 minutes walking distance from Chiangmai Gate and the Saturday walking street. We offer complimentary home cooked breakfast every morning and a complimentary pick up service from the airport.The spaceThe two story house is builtwith teak wood and concrete. There are two bedrooms(a double bed and a single bed), one bathroom and the open seating space upstairs. On the bottom floor, there is one bedroom (a double bed), a working room and two bathrooms. The house is equipped with a kitchen, a small bar and the front yard. The space is suitable for a family or a group of friends who wish to relax in the heart of Chiangmai.

reviews.reivew: a phenomenal experience. beautiful large wooden house with comfortable bedand great air conditioning. close to a few small restaurants and walking distance to the busy areas.  the hosts are amazing and we're available anytime. we had forgotten something at the house and mo personally delivered it to the airport before we left chiangmai.I fully recommend this place to any and all.

I don’t even know where to begin, the most incredible hosts/staff I could ever imagine. My friend and I feltso welcomed after a long day of travelling to a cold drink and a guided tour up a mountain on a motor bike that the staff helped us organize. Every day was filled with ideas of what we could do, where to go and what to see which made every day very successful. “No plan is the best plan” is what we learned and we are forever grateful. The house is everything you want for a treehouse vibe including the geckos, 10/10.
What a great airbnb! Great location, authentic, superb hosts, lovely breakfast

Hands down, the BEST experience I've had on this website. From the pickup at the airport to the check-in, up until the moment of picking up our bags at the end of our stay, everything was absolutely phenomenal. The property itself was beautiful. A wonderful mix of greenery and traditional wooden structure, we could not have asked for a better stay. The rooms were very spacious, and we especially loved the second floor outdoor lounging area! Perfect place to get together with your group before you go back inside your rooms or leave for the day. The location was great, just minutes away from the Chiang Mai Gate, and within all the designated pick-up areas for my adventures. I walked from the gate to the house alone at night and feltvery safe. It's also in a very residential part, slightly away from all the action (but close enough to walk to the action), which was great as we didn't have to deal with any noise at night.I do need to give a shout-out to the breakfast! I opted for breakfast every day of my trip, and it was so delicious I still dream aboutit. The food itself was absolutely phenomenal, and the team that prepared it were such great wholesome people! My elephant sanctuary pickup came a little earlier than expected, and the team made sure I had enough food with me so I wouldn't be hungry (and I was so happy they did because otherwise I would've been so hungry throughout the day).Also another shoutout for Mo and Ton and the team for being the most helpful and wonderful hosts anyone could ask for! Even from before my trip, they helped me with reservations for all of my adventures, and during the trip whenever I had any questions they were so quick to respond, I never feltconfused or lost.

Amazing! You feel like in a rural area with squirells, bats, and geckos... but 5 mins walk to old city. Very unique and traditional style house and furnishings... but there is aircon and WiFi. Plus they offer you a fully cooked breakfast in the morning with coffee and fresh fruit. They can organise a driver or a tour or anything! English speaker staff. Perfect trip. I will definitely stay again

Wow!!  We had an amazing stay. I wish we would have stayed longer. The house is really beautiful and spacious. My husband and kid did a cooking class. I was afraid fours hours would be too long, but they stayed fully engaged. They ran to the kitchen the next morning to help cook!  The staff were incredibly nice. I definitely recommend you stay here😍

title: Maya Homestay Peora - Bed & Breakfast
about: We are situated in Peora village. From our elevated home, up above the main cluster of village homes one can see the green hills of Kumaon while Almora glitters in the near distance. We are in the midst of fruit bearing orchards full of apricot, plum, pear, malta and peach trees.On a clear day one can see the high Himalayas from our house starting from Chaukhamba till Panchachuli.A delicious local breakfast is also part of your stay.The spaceThe room is on the top floor of the independent block and part of larger Maya's Homestay. A spacious room nicely lit with a rustic look and mud plastered walls and a wooden flooring. There is a working space with a desk and chair facing a large window opening up to the most scenic view of the hills. The window also comes with alcove seating from where one can watch the skies unfold their magic. The room has a modern bathroom with all the amenities. There is a private sit-out overlooking apricot and peach trees. There is a newly set-up stone and brick table in the courtyard which also doubles up as a place to eat your meals or drink your tea/coffee.The family has two dogs and a cat.

reviews.reivew: Nestled amidst a grove of flowering trees, shrubs and creepers Maya’s homestay offers a simple, clean and beautifully slow way of life. This is to say that utilities are easily available including a good mobile network.Maya Ji and her family are very  hospitable with Maya Ji’s delectable cooking being a show stealer which alone shall leave you yearning for more. The Himalayan peaks in the distance and the valley beneath the home are views one can not have enough. Alcoves of Himalayan birds are plentiful in the crooked pathways and and roads surrounding the property.The room is quite cozy and comfortable with a window that offers a pristinely serene view. And it does have hot water supply.They also have insanely cute pets.
it was one of the most memorable stays we had. Maya di is an exceptional host and a great cook..

Beautiful place, beautiful host. Maya's homestay is away from the main road. It's a 500 mtr village walk from the main road. Maya and her husband both are great human beings. Especially, Maya's husband. He is a gentleman and always has a smile on his face, no matter what. The room is cosy and a perfect place to chill. It gives you a spectacular view of the mountains.  It has a study table and amazing books to read. The hosts live in the same vicinity and are quite reachable. Honestly, you would even feel the need to reach out to them, they are very proactive and understanding. They will offer you chai multiple times and would make sure you are having a comfortable stay. The food here is no fuss home-cooked delicious food. The best part is that the hosts will eat with you. Maya's husband works at a post office in Mukteshwar and he walks half the way there daily. So you can accompany him for a walk till Muksteshwar whenever you want. You need to take a shared cab to a village called 'Shitla' and then walk all the way to Mukteshwar. It's a 4-5kms hike one way. Have some breakfast at Mukteshwar and then he will accompany you back to the homestay after finishing his work. He usually takes an hour to finish his work. Overall, I had an amazing stay at Maya's homestay and would strongly recommend you to book this property.

This is a beautiful and quaint homestay in an equally quaint village. Maya didi, the host and her family are amazing and hospitable people. The room is extremely aesthetically done, very clean, and had all the required arrangements. The food is cooked by Maya didi herself, which is delicious and you get to experience a different kind of cuisine. Their dogs Rocky and Daboo are absolute darlings and so is their cat Kuku! The co-host Sriparna and her family is also a great addition to this place. We celebrated Mita auntie's birthday in the most adorable way possible. Overall, we had a lovely experience here and we can't wait to come back and chill for a few days! If you truly want to have a homestay experience, this is your place to be.

Location is offbeat and secluded from main road so no noise except birds chirping and natural insect sounds. It feels like harmony with nature and beautiful valley view from the location and a lot of fresh fruits and excellent host.

This was one of the most wonderful trips I have had and quite a memorable one. I went in with no expectations but just a relaxing break from a fast paced life. But this trip was so much more and all thanks to Maya's Homestay.A beautiful room at overlooks the mountains, fresh apricots from the strees, two cute dogs and a cat to cuddle with and the most delicious home-cooked meals that feltlike a warm hug. When it was time to leave, it was obviously very difficult. I will miss the hikes, the furry cuddles, the sunsets and all the kind people. I hope to visit this place soon and for longer this time around. Many thanks for the hosts for being so wonderful and making this trip memorable.

title: Colonel's Cottage - Lake view
about: Into the harkened light of day, into the blessed blue, comes a silhouette that is born of shapen light. And to the eyes, the adjusting eyes, to the brain still processing the freshly brightened hues, appears doors, windows, a roof of fine tile, a cottage of gay castle-heart.

reviews.reivew: A lovely location and a beautiful garden are few of the perks of staying at this property. We spent a night here with our dog while on a road trip through Kumaon. Chirping birds, great hosts and delicious food makes this the perfect place to rest and relax.

I had a truly wonderful stay. It was all so good from check in till my last day. The family is really friendly and warm and they helped me a lot with guidance regarding tourism. Apart from this, I got the best food here. Pina colada drink was my favourite. I would like to visit the same property again if I get a chance. :)

This was my first home stay and it has exceeded all our expectations. It had a awesome hill view with a beautiful terrace garden.  Karan and his father (col. Uncle ) were very helpful.  Uncle called us in the morning and guided with the route. He also ensured to meet us on the arrival. The cook- Amar is a great cook and made some  scrumptious food.  Rooms very decent size and well maintained.  Col. Uncle also helped us book an amazing jungle resort in binsar. All in all- we spent great time and made some unforgettable memories.  I strongly recommend this place if you are looking for a peaceful and quality family time.

title: Bhubanbari Chrysalis AC King bath+kitchen+terrace
about: A 200-year old heritage home with a courtyard and a Durga Temple (Dalan) in the heart of North Kolkata. Renovated by a film maker, the photogenic interiors blend bohemian exuberance with new age spirituality. Durga Puja by the extended family can be observed in the Dalan. The airy garden terraces of this home are a unique feature rarely found in Kolkata homes.Home cooked meals available from Nita's Kitchen (min. Rs 150).Breakfast available Rs. 150/person/day.The spaceYou will have access to terraces, a balcony, a kitchenette, and two bathrooms. For Covid safety, we request that you wear a mask when around other guests.

reviews.reivew: What I love aboutthis place that makes me come back here time and again, is its unique fusion of Bohemian aesthetics with modern amenitiesin an old Bengali heritage house. It is amazingly serene and secluded from all the humdrums outside, even though it is located at the heart of a bustling city. Last but not the least, the hosts Gaurab and Nandini are extremely amiable people who love to share their travel experiences from around the world.It is highly recommended for anyone looking for a quiet and private place to unwind at and enjoy the old Calcutta charm.

I had a tremendous stay at Bhubanbari and cannot wait to go back! The laidback vibes are perfection- lush plants, gorgeous fixtures aboutthe house, and lovely artwork all enhance the stay. Gourab and Nandini are fantastic, kind, and helpful hosts. The North Kolkata area is pleasant and unassuming, with lots of great restaurants nearby and even a pool/park right across the street! I cannot recommend enough!
Really nice

We always wanted to see an old traditional Bengali house. We were delighted to find this. Bhubanbari should be an inspiration to all such old Victorian time houses which should renovate just enough to open their doors to national and international guests and give them a much desired Kolkata experience that we get to see only in movies. This house is honestly a HIDDEN GEM in Kolkata. The corridors, common spaces and the entire house is quiet, peaceful and clean. The library room has a good collection of books. The rooftop (meaning top of the rooftop) is a dream place for anyone to enjoy a perfect dusk or dawn. The workers do not interfere and are simple and nice.

title: Florence Homestay - The typical Indian house
about: Come stay in my beautiful house where you can sleep in one of the 3 private rooms available. You will also have access to the kitchen, a washroom and a pretty courtyard to enjoy the sun… and of course a free internet connection! Each night you will be charged 199 rupees, a dinner and a breakfast are included for each person.

reviews.reivew: Lovely and friendly family. I really enjoyed my stay. Thanks for the hospitality!

title: Aeya Aamaar Homestay ( only female guests)
about: It is a cosy and comfortable homestay in a posh locality.This is exclusively for female guests. Enjoy peace and quiet in this beautiful abodeThe spaceThe room is in the ground floor. The hosts , an elderly couple , stay in the property.

reviews.reivew: A home away from home. Great location, spotless washroom, safe & relaxing stay for women. Bibi is v warm & welcoming. Definitely my first choice for a calm & relaxing holiday or work trip to Guwahati.
Bibi is a wonderful person and host. She helped me out in every possible way during my stay in Guwahati. Well located, clean and artistically done space.
Good location. Clean and beautifully done space. Very homely. Bibi is a wonderful host. She and her family respect the guest's privacy.

Nice, safe and peaceful place to stay. Host was very helpful in providing information aboutplaces and temples to visit.  She provided the contact number of a priest in Kamakhya temple who organized the ticket and darshan in the temple for me. She also provided contact number of a local taxi driver cum guide.  Besides she had the breakfast cooked according to my special dietary needs. Thank you so much!

Bibi’s home is so cosy and welcoming - we really enjoyed talking with her and sitting in a mosquito-netted room in the garden, with the smell of plants and the rain all around us. It was one of the most relaxing and hospitable places we have stayed and we recommend to all looking for a quiet and kind place to relax.

Bibi’s place is a charming bungalow in Guwahati, centrally located but in a quiet lane. The hosts are warm and hospitable but give you your privacy. The lady caretaker was prompt in service. My window opened to the Bungalow garden which was lovely coz it was monsoon. This airbnb is suitable for both business and leisure travellers who prefer safe and quiet stay compared to a crowded and noisy stay in a hotel.

title: Room with A/c, ensuite on Lansdowne near Elgin
about: Connect directly to the airconditioned room with ensuite  in a colonial style home. Just 1.8 kms from Park Street. Toiletries, tea and coffee, biscuits and fruit and basic crockery. Fast Wifi. Attached bathroom with geyser and shower is cleaned every morning. Wash clothes in my washing machine and access kitchen with all amenities.Main road has a cab stand and public transport. This area is not far from Victoria Memorial. Many cafes, a dhaba and restaurants.The spaceI also provide a small clothes wardrobe and breakfast. Additional main meals are Rs. 300/- for vegetarians, Rs. 400/- for non vegetarians. A geyser in the bathroom when you need a hot shower.The pullout bed under the small double bed to accomdate two guests.

reviews.reivew: Anita is a very kind, gentle host who helps you to have a good stay in the City of Joy.She will make sure you have a good breakfast before you go off on your adventures. Two good places to eat very local to her, particularly the S.Indian place round the corner. Yummy ice cream across the road. Local bus to The Mother House. Metro about15 mins or Uber taxi for transport.
Had a great time!!

Care & a home away from home. These two lived experience were constant throughout my stay. Anita’ hospitality made my stay comfortable.  For instance, her assurance and suggestion for best food around the area or the bed side morning tea  showcase the warmth she puts on every host.    The red oxide flooring and the comfy bed makes the stay aesthetically pleasing.  The window opposite the bed echos the titleof a Hindi novel , Deewar Mai Ek Khidki Rehti Thi.I would recommend Anita’s place for calm and homely stay.

We had such a lovely time staying at Anita’s Airbnb. We were so well taken care of by Anita and feltlike we were at home. The room is clean and well put-together. It can be a bit cozy for two people when the second bed is pulled out, but I feltthat we were able to manage just fine for a month’s stay. The bathroom runs well and is cleaned regularly. The breakfast and tea was so lovely and such a great way to start our busy days. We were there for work and found the WiFi to be quite reliable and the location is well positioned in Kolkata. The AC also runs very well!Anita was such a wonderful, helpful, and accommodating host! I would definitely stay at her Airbnb again if given the chance to go back to Kolkata!

Anita is very good host and she made my stay very comfortable. The location is excellent as it’s in the city centre. The place was clean and the breakfast was good. It was really nice meeting Anita and having long chats. All in all I had a good experience. Thank you Anita
I needed isolation and she respected that. On the other hand the place is very much the same as described. One can feel at home because the host makes you feel like that.

title: Khasmahal Homestay
about: Khas Mahal Home Stay offers you a comfortable stay in the ambiance of an Indian home, situated close to the Taj Mahal. Thoughtfully designed with modern amenities, Khas Mahal Home Stay offers the opportunity to unwind and relax to both the business as well as the tourist traveler.The spaceA home away from home.               All  rooms are large enough , with air conditioning and ensuite bathroom ( hot & cold water ) . All rooms are on ground floor .Common Lobby and sitting areas are enough for our guests to relax .A beautiful green leafy garden is their to make you more connected to nature .An excellent WiFi is available in entire property .Breakfast is included in your stay .Authentic meals freshly cooked are available at the property at a very reasonable price.

reviews.reivew: I have stayed in homestay in the month of October 2022. Homestay was very neat and clean and host is very helpful and provide all kind of information aboutnear by place. Homestay close to all other attractions.Food is very delicious, and everyone must try. I would recommend you must try this homestay and you will never regret. I am very thankful to the host. It was very memorable trip to Agra and our stayed at home stay .
One of my best ever experiences in homestays! Aiyush Sir and Pooja Aunty are the best hosts ever! And the brilliant cooking by Pooja Aunty is icing on the cake!

The hospitality was amazing! Our hosts were so kind and welcoming and willing to help with whatever we needed. We even forgot our phone at a restaurant and they were so kind to drive us there in the middle of the night to retrieve it!
The hosts were responsive and hospitable. Dinner was home cooked and one of our best meals in India!

We had a fantastic time in Agra and can only recommend other travellers to stay at the Airbnb of these two wonderful people. They were always very helpful, friendly and warmhearted. The rooms are very clean and cozy but the best thing is that they provided us a real local experience with their Tuk Tuk Driver Vicky. Again, thank you so much for having us. We would at all time come back.

What a good host with great communication and very quick to respond to any concerns. Gives good recommendations on what to see and help with providing services such as hiring a driver to take you to places at a reasonable cost. We absolutely enjoyed the homestay and will definitely recommend to anyone else visiting Agra!!!

title: En-suite Room & Bathroom|Private Balcony|WiFi
about: As the  namesuggests the place is located in the heart of the Kolkata! The area is very popular and busy. It's a bungalow style house with lots of greenery and fresh air. The house is designed in simple manner with all the comforts of modern living. The room is situated on the 2nd floor.The spaceAboutThe place is located in the heart of city! The house is spacious, comfortable. The room is spacious with all the modern amenities.A superb double bedroom with all modern conveniences located in central Kolkata.Your room has:- A double bedroom- A/C, Wi-Fi, Hot kettle, Water Jar, Tea/Coffee Satchets- A private en-suite bathroom with 24*7 hot water, shampoo/soap, towels etc.- A private balcony-A sofaWhat to expect:- We provide hot breakfast everyday which is a part of your stay and not chargeable.- We also provide other meals(Lunch/Dinner) at a nominal charge of Rs. 250  per head per meal. However you are requested to tell us in advance about the same.- You can give your clothes for washing/ironing. The charges of washing are  Rs.10 per piece. The charges for ironing are Rs.10 per piece. However, we are  not responsible for any damage, cuts, colour bleed, burns etc.- Cleaning is done everyday. We request our guests to leave the room open so that the cleaning can be done. There are no charges for that.- Towels can be replenished on demand.

reviews.reivew: Place was good and same as expected. Food taste was good. Host and caretaker is always approachable. Peaceful place. We had nice stay and happy to book again!
2) Convinient Location to stroll around kolkata.Spacious Room and Upgraded Washroom.Swift Service from Caretaker.Food Service needs a bit improvement.Precisely,Agreeable Stay.

title: Cassiopeia-3/Private Room/Attached Bath/Breakfast
about: Cassiopeia Guest House is located in the very center of town nestled in a residential locality called Laitumkhrah, where all the major locations like Police Bazar, Polo, etc. are all within walking distance. If you prefer to use local transportation, the main road is just a 2 minute walk away where you will find a proper bus stand/taxi stand. We are always happy to help you by giving you any other additional information and also help you with any other requirements for the duration of your stay.The spaceThe room has 1 queen bed and can accomodate upto 2 guests. The room is spacious and has been designed to give you a relaxing and comfortable stay.- 24x7 Hot Water - 24x7 Drinking Water - 24x7 Electricity - TV (Cable)- Wifi - Pick up from airport, on request at nominal charges- Police Bazaar, 3.5km- Tourist taxi service avaliable 24x7 at doorstep

reviews.reivew: superb stay. awesome hospitality. highly recommended. it's also at the centre of the town. the hosts, cleaner and entire staff is very very well mannered. many amenitiesare provided like refridgerator, oven, electric kettle etc which are not currently visible in the photo gallery. pls go ahead with booking. no second thought
Great ambience and hospitality
The place is very clean as well the staff were really good
highly recommended.host behaviour was awesome 👍😎
Stay is at a height, so if you have seniors you may want to rethink as it's a small climb that can be done slowly.

The place is neat and clean with all amenitieslike oven and fridge available in the room. It is located very close to police station. Complimentary breakfast provided was tasty but dinner available by some third party restaurant was not upto the mark. Recommended for stay as it is centrally located and very clean!!!

title: Ba hao Residence x MAITRI CHIT ROOM
lt: Bangkok, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon, Thailand
about: MAITRI CHIT ROOM - is a spacious en-suite open plan room located on the 3rd floor of the renovated 40-year old shophouse call Ba hao. The room is a Thai-contemporary inspired,  with a huge glass window overlooking the vibrant soi nana near Chinatown. No matter you need natural daylight or a clean sleeping, this room is suitable for you with double layer roll-up curtain, it can be adjusted to suit your mood.Extra bed is available upon request.The spaceBā hào 八號 is a Bangkok-based co-living platform located near china town. Our place is a renovated 40-year old shop house in a vibrant area of Bangkok’s china town consists of; 1st floor is Bā hào 八號 – Oriental-style Bar focusing on beers and Chinese-inspired comfort bar food 2nd floor is MITRPHAN – a shared living room equipped with 55-inch LCD TV with Netflix, pantry with complimentary coffee, tea, snack, drinking water, soft drinks, toast, spreads and utensils.3rd floor (this room) is MAITRI CHIT room – an en-suite room with magnificent view of Soi Nana 4th floor is SANTIPHAP – an en-suite room with private balcony and your own visual portrait of one of the most sacred temple in Bangkok, Trimitr Temple. See here: http://abnb.me/EVmg/PTWaEYd7UC Bā hào 八號 means “house no. 8” in Chinese language which is obviously our shop house address. Number 8 is considered a lucky number for Chinese people. The main reason has to do with the pronunciation of the word for the number 8 in China. It is pronounced ba and sounds like the word for prosperity which is pronounced fa

reviews.reivew: Marvelous. Everything.

Incredible space, in a really fun neighborhood in China Town, lots of great bars steps away from the door and the main dragon is maybe a 6 min walk. Bua was an amazing host and the room was perfect, only wish I could have spent more time here!
it was relay nice experience staying at Ba Hao. The neighbor is really cool, the room was really clean and cozy, and the breakfast was complementary. Only downside is the noise level in the night.
love the people love the place so much
Absolute stunning room, great service, over all just an awesome place. We will definitely recommend the Airbnb not just for the awesome room, but especially for the great hospitality!
great accomodation. nicely renovated  without loosing its classic feel. good location and close to MRT. would definitely coming back to stay

title: Elegant 1 Bedroom -With Bath- Near Metro/Market
about: Hi & Welcome to Delhi!Kailash Colony is a very  central location for people travelling for business, pleasure or just transiting from Delhi. The perfect location for families & female travelers near the Metro and market. My 2nd floor Apartment has this bedroom as well as a Studio Apartment with a Double Bed and another Bedroom with a Double Bed so I can offer alternate rooms  for my guests.The Sunlight is ample, the Terrace is beautiful and the breakfast is lovely! Hope to see you soon!The spaceThe Place:The Apartment of mine is located on the second floor of the building with easy access to the elevator. The Common areas are amply furnished along with a Terrace functioning as a great place to gather and relax.The Room:The Bed is a King-size bed with access to extra pillows, blankets and duvets. The TV in the room has access to 200+ channels through DTH service.  There is Power Back-up for the Apartment though there are no power cuts in this area. The Bathroom is attached with all the modern fixtures available.Amenities:*WiFi*TV*Heater*A/C*BreakfastUnique Speciality:My place is perfect for business travellers and families alike as its not only is it located in a safe & posh neighbourhood, it's conveniently located with close access to Public transport and major points of interest in Delhi.Other Listing:I have another listing located in the same premises having almost the similar features. If the calendar doesn't show availability for this listing, I'd request you to look at those as well.

reviews.reivew: One of the best Airbnb I have stayed so far. Colonel Uncle house has everything one can think of for a comfortable stay. Clean and spacious room ; separate room for extra storage ; Healthy breakfast; LED tv ; Beautiful and spacious terrace I have ever seen and most importantly u will get to meet genuinely nice and sweet people like Uncle and Aunty. They will treat you like their own kid . It is because of places like Col. uncle's place which truly gives u feel of home away from home and makes Airbnb my first choice. Also their home is so close to market and Good restaurant's. Uncle and Aunty are really helpful and made it so easy for me during this lockdown days in Delhi :) :)

Colonel sir and his wife are the most wonderful people I have met in my life. They never feel you as if you're away from home. Their home is so well maintained that you feel to have stayed a bit longer.
cosy place to stay. cooperative host.

Col. R.K’s place is cozy and homely. I thoroughly enjoyed my chats with him and his better half. The place is very convenient. It’s a two minute walk to the Kailash Colony metro staton and market and also the Modern Bazar super market which is a big plus for all your requirements which can be stocked in your room’s mini fringe. They make a lovely couple and make you feel part of the family. It’s lovely to note their concern and care and to make you feel at home.
Exceptional hosts. Beautiful and clean accommodation in an excellent location. Highly recommend.
Amazing trip with worth it facilités .Lovely people to be around :)

title: Bed & Oats - Private Bedroom in Gurgaon -2
about: luxury bed and breakfast in Gurgaon within close proximity of metro, udyog vihar and cyber city.The spaceBed & Oats is a luxury accommodation placed at the heart of Gurgaon. With an abundance of greenery around, and breathtaking views of the Aravalli Hills.The property has a total of 6 rooms and each room has a private bathroom.

reviews.reivew: An amazing host!

title: Saki Homestay Room 2
about: A quite and comfortable space for your perfect getaway to Ziro, Arunachal Pradesh. Our place is located at Siiro Village, about3 kms away from the main market area. The house overlook hills and paddy fields, and has a spacious outdoor for recreational activities.  The host will be within reach at all times to address any requirements and queries.  We hope you'll enjoy your time at this peaceful getaway.  We really look forward to hosting you soon and make your stay a memorable one.

reviews.reivew: We were a group of 8 people and we had an amazing stay at Hassang's place. The place was very clean, we were provided with all amenitiesand the location was breathtaking. The hosts are very warm and helpful and we feltvery welcomed and comfortable at their place.

title: Glenrose. Private Room #1
about: Some info has been automatically translated.

reviews.reivew: Everything aboutstaying with Amelie was fantastic. Her home is just as beautiful, stylish, cool and clean as pictured. The bed we slept in was heavenly.Amelie is a wonderful host and she and her husband Christophe were kind and helpful - happy to share tips aboutlocal places to eat, visit, learn to surf or practice yoga . Amelie made us feel really at home - and we feel like although we arrived as guests, we left as great friends! We can’t wait to go back .

title: Huge Luxurious room in B2, Safdarjung Enclave
about: This is a perfect homestay/ bed and breakfast in Safdarjung Enclave.This place offers a mix of homely environment and hotel like services in a quiet & leafy neighborhood. We have a caretaker who is always available to the guests.Me and my wife lives in the next building, so we will also be there to to help our guests whenever required.We are very excited to host our property and would love to welcome people from all around the world.The spaceSafdarjung Enclave is located just south of the Ring Road and north of the Hauz Khas Deer Park.We have large independant rooms with provision of air conditioner and attached bathroom.This property is brand new with all the basic amenities.

reviews.reivew: Thank you once again Sunil for accommodating my last min booking request. One of the major amenitiesof my house broke which made me book Airbnb very last min. This was my third stay at Sunil's listing and as usual cleanliness was 10/10. He is a very humble and a great host, with a great staff too.

This was a great listing. It is located in Safdarjung enclave. Very easy to access. It had all amenitiesmentioned in the description. It was really well maintained and cleanliness was 10/10. The host Sunil was very responsive and polite. The care taker was available all the time to help. We got great service and faced no problems.
good place, value for your money
It was a great stay and well maintained property 10/10
Good place. You get value for money. Sunil is co-operating.

title: Family studio with terrace in Govt. approved B&B
about: A beautiful red gulmohar tree peeks in through arched windows in this studio large enough for 3-4 guests. The room has a huge attached terrace, kitchenette & private bathroom. Our centrally located B&B has spacious, comfortable bedrooms. All rooms have AC, Satellite TV, towels & running hot water. Market & Delhi metro train at a short walk away. Free high speed wifi, printing facilities & free parking. Located in a safe, gated neighborhood with CCTV surveillance, 24x7 water & electricity supply.The spaceLocated in the heart of South Delhi, in the safe, gated colony of Hauz Khas, this B&B is duly registered with the ministry of Tourism, Govt. of Delhi.It has tastefully furnished air conditioned rooms, with attached baths, balconies, sitting lobby, fully equipped common modular kitchen and terrace.Very well connected with the city center being just 5Kms and the International Airport 11Kms (25-30 Minutes drive).Ethnic Indian handicrafts and designer markets Hauz Khas Village, Shahpur Jat and Delhi Haat are within walking distance.Major Hospitals (AIIMS, Fortis, Max etc.), Shopping Malls, places of tourist interest (Qutub Minar, Lotus Temple, Safdarjung tomb etc.) all  within 10-15 minutes of drive.Room facilities include LCD TVs with cable connection, Air conditioning, Hair dryer, Iron etc. Free high speed wi-fi. We provide Laundry services, Taxi hires on request. Our hearty (optional, chargeable) breakfast and sumptuous meals have won us many a repeat guests from around the world - fresh home cooked Indian delicacies lovingly prepared by the hostess. Our signature dish being Aloo Paratha - the Indian version of pancake made of wheat stuffed with potatoes and a perfect blend of choicest spices cooked to a beautiful golden crisp served hot with home made pickle and fresh home made curd (yoghurt). Other dishes include fried bread rolls, roasted puffed rice, the tri color gram flour sandwich and many more. We'd like to keep some mystery for you to unravel when you join us!Having roots in Delhi for the past more than 120 years, we have loads of stories aboutthe city, its past and present which we love sharing along with our culture and traditions with the guests. Our family stays on the ground floor of the same property and are always available for any queries. We offer a personalized experience and are open to interaction with guests from all over the world - we invite them to share their stories with us over a freshly brewed cup of cappuccino or a home cooked Indian meal which we are happy to serve them (payable extra) if they so wish.Let us welcome you to our family and give you a home away from home experience.Allocation of the room depends on availability. You can also view our other listings by going to any of the following links in case this one is not available or doesn't meet your requirements. You can also go through the reviewsposted for those listings -https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/339650https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/333238https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/896964https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/339632https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/8017939Guest accessGuests have 24x7 access to a fully equipped kitchen, a common terrace and our garden apart from the balcony with their room, if any.Guests can always come sit with us in our drawing cum dining room.Other things to note-For a speedy check in, guests are requested to carry photocopies of their travel documents i.e. Passport and Visa (in case of international traveler) and valid government issued photo IDs except PAN card (for domestic travelers) for ALL GUESTS staying. -Guests with Delhi domicile or unmarried couples from anywhere in India are not entertained due to instructions from local police authorities.-If you wish to smoke please do so on the terrace or in the driveway/garden.-We lock the house gates at 11pm for security purpose. These timings are  flexible on request. In case a guest is reaching after the gates are shut, they can ring the bell right next to the gate and we will be happy to let them in.-Clean water and electricity are a privilege that still many homes in India can't afford. We request you to use both judiciously and make sure there is no wastage. We appreciate your understanding and consideration. Have a happy stay!

reviews.reivew: Mr. and Mrs. Gupta. Thank you for hosting us. It was very comfortable stay. Special appreciation on homely breakfast which didn't made me feel I am away from home. I will be visiting again. :) Marking favourite on my profile.
We had a short but really nice stay at Ajay‘s place. The whole family was exceptionally nice and very welcoming and helpful! The breakfast was very good and we had interesting conversations!
Seamless process to check in and out.Very centrally located.All ameneties mentioned are available. Overall a very good experience.

Two friends and I stayed at Ajay's place for a few days. The place is quite well located in a secure area. the room and other accessible spaces were excellent. Greatly appreciate the timely responses and support extended by Sagar.
overall a happy experience staying at this appartment, its in a quite and clean neighborhood in delhi,i highly recommend
Beautiful place to stay in !

title: Double Room near Taj Mahal with Balcony
about: Our home is a 4 story house located within walking distance to the Taj Mahal. Our home has beautiful spacious sitting areas, including two balconies, and a large two floor terrace with the view of the Taj Mahal.Homemade meals:-The meals are prepared by mother Ranjana, she cooks vegetarian Indian food, everything's freshly cooked in her open kitchen.Dinner is served at the dinning table, and all the guests eat together, which gives travelers a great chance to interact with out travelers.The spaceThis double room has a queen size bed, and is located on the first floor of the house (counting with ground floor) with a large shared balconyIt has:-Air-conditioning,Working desk,Private bathroom with hot water 24 hours,Very good WiFi,Television, andhas all the necessary amenitiesthat you may need like towels, shower gel, shampoo, kettle.

reviews.reivew: Don’t hesitate for a moment ! Aman Hostel is an amazing family ambient you won’t regret, don’t skip dinner , the food is amazing. Thanks to amens family our stay was just perfect.
The place was really nice and hosts are very friendly too
Cute house with elevator near the Taj Mahal. Host was very accommodating and her son was very helpful. Would book again!
The place is comfortable, spacious, clean, and in a great location. The meals served are truly delicious home cooked meals at very good value. Highly recommended!

This is an oasis of calm and comfort - secure and welcoming. Vicky Manchanda (9897255020) the resident taxi extraordinaire collected us from the station and helped us/  guided us / befriended us / provided us with contacts at our next destination (Jaipur).. his brother Mirza too.. consider hiring his taxi for the day for circa R1500.. it takes the stress out of getting around town. The Homestay supper was first class. Anan and Lena both helped and recommended places (The Grand Gopika Thali restaurant was were the local families went to eat and fantastic value / the Pinch of Spice more touristy but very good). It was an easy walk to the Taj Mahal (try the gardens near the taj .. a great view ) - the view from the roof terrace of the Homestay was incredible. Well worth the little extra compared with other airbnb places. One thing to be aware of .. it is very easy to lock your partner in the bathroom / room with the door bolts on the outside... but her cries for help are quickly heard :). If you are short of time Agra can be done in 2 days unless you are intending to travel around / outside the town.

Was a lovely home. Rooms are very clean and comfortable. Just outside are lots of tuck tuck so getting around was easy and cheap. The only thing i would say is it is more like a boutique hotel then a homestay.

title: Rustic Wood House #3 | Jibhi | Tirthan Valley
about: An offbeat location for adventure enthusiasts who love natures, trekking/hiking, valleys, mountains, exploring village life, and local cuisine Rustic wood house is located in Bini Village, Banjar, Kullu(H.P.), to Shringa Rishi Temple and Chehni Kothi. Tourist attractions like Jibhi waterfalls, Tirthan valley, Jalori Pass, Serolsar Lake, Shringa Rishi Temple, Chehni Kothi. Experience local village tours, orchid visits, trout fishing, trekking, and local festival (Faguli -festival of Masks)The spaceEntire Wooden cabin builtwith Himalayan Cedarwood-The cabin has 4 rooms (2 double and 2 single) builtwith Himalayan Cedarwood. It has a small garden on the premises and free open parking nearby the main road.-The cabin is situated 50 meters from the main road, hidden in the cedar forest amidst Bini village.-The room accommodates 3 people, but we can arrange for 4 on request (Extra charges included).-Free open parking at 50 meters distance from the Property.-Wifi Dongle can be arranged on request with free unlimited data(available as per network Operator, let us know in advance)Please note: We are available 24/7 to make your stay comfortable and memorable, don't hesitate to reach us for anything.

reviews.reivew: The homestay is positioned amidst the beautiful lush green meadow where you can chill,relax and enjoy the sunset between the mountains. The house is located just 50 mtrs from road and vehicles/transportation is easily available The homemade food is also delicious.The owner Sunil was very supportive and helpful throughout our stay .He guided us through when we lost our way and very polite in nature.All the amenitiesare present in the homestay to make you stay comfortable and pleasent.The neighborhood is very nice and people are friendly who welcomed us warm heartedly.

about: Winters Brook homestay cottage is your rare find.
